im trying to get help so that I can actually right click on my desktop and have the ability to put icons on it.
That's a little better. Try this command, then restart nautilus: gconftool-2 --type bool --set /apps/nautilus/preferences/show_desktop true
thank you. Now how do I restart nautilus?
From your terminal run 'killall nautilus' and run 'nautilus' from Alt+F2 run dialog
I tried killall and it said no process found
Ok, just run nautilus then
